spell.name: Jab
spell.desc: Attacks with a series of rapid thrusts using a javelin or spear class weapon.

spell.name: Power Strike
spell.desc: Adds lightning damage to attacks with javelin and spear class weapons.

spell.name: Poison Javelin
spell.desc: Magically enhances your javelin to leave a trail of poison clouds.

spell.name: Fend
spell.desc: Attacks all adjacent targets.

spell.name: Lightning Bolt
spell.desc: Magically converts your javelin into a bolt of lightning.

spell.name: Charged Strike
spell.desc: Adds lightning damage to javelin and spear class weapons and releases charged bolts upon impact.

spell.name: Plague Javelin
spell.desc: Magically enhances your javelin to release expanding clouds of poison upon impact.

spell.name: Ground Slam
spell.desc: Forcefully drive your spear into the earth creating three exploding fissures on impact.

spell.name: Lightning Strike
spell.desc: Adds lightning damage to javelin and spear class weapons and releases chain lightning upon impact.

spell.name: Lightning Fury
spell.desc: Changes a thrown javelin into a powerful bolt of lightning that splits on impact.

spell.name: Inner Sight
spell.desc: Passive - Illuminates nearby enemies making them easier to hit for you and your party.

spell.name: Lethal Strike
spell.desc: Passive - Your attacks have a chance to do double damage.

spell.name: Phase Run
spell.desc: Transcend to a heighten state, granting faster movement and recovery.

spell.name: Dodge
spell.desc: Passive - You have a chance to dodge a melee attack when attacking or standing still.

spell.name: Avoid
spell.desc: Passive - You have a chance to dodge enemy missiles when attacking or standing still.

spell.name: Penetrate
spell.desc: Passive - Increases your attack rating.

spell.name: Evade
spell.desc: Passive - You have a chance to dodge a melee or missile attack when walking or running.

spell.name: Decoy
spell.desc: Creates a stationary duplicate of yourself that draws fire from enemies and shoots arrows.

spell.name: Valkyrie
spell.desc: Summons a powerful Valkyrie ally.

spell.name: Pierce
spell.desc: Passive - Your missiles have a chance to pass through enemies that they hit.

spell.name: Cold Arrow
spell.desc: Magically enhances your arrows or bolts by adding cold damage and a slowing effect.

spell.name: Magic Arrow
spell.desc: Creates a magical arrow or bolt that does extra damage.

spell.name: Multiple Shot
spell.desc: Magically splits one arrow or bolt into many.

spell.name: Fire Arrow
spell.desc: Magically enhances your arrows or bolts with fire, which leaves a burning trail behind it.

spell.name: Ice Arrow
spell.desc: Magically enhances your arrow or bolt to freeze your enemies.

spell.name: Guided Arrow
spell.desc: Enhances your arrows and bolts to track your target or seek one of its own.

spell.name: Exploding Arrow
spell.desc: Enchants an arrow or bolt that explodes on contact, damaging all nearby enemies.

spell.name: Strafe
spell.desc: Magically splits one arrow into several that target multiple nearby enemies.

spell.name: Immolation Arrow
spell.desc: Enhances arrows or bolts to cause severe fire damage and creates a pyre upon impact.

spell.name: Freezing Arrow
spell.desc: Magically enhances an arrow or bolt to freeze entire groups of monsters.

spell.name: Dual Strike
spell.desc: Slice and dice your enemies with your dual claw-class weapons.

spell.name: Fists of Ember
spell.desc: Charge-up attack which adds fire damage to your hits.

spell.name: Fists of Thunder
spell.desc: Charge-up attack which adds lightning damage to your fists.

spell.name: Fists of Ice
spell.desc: Charge-up attack which adds cold damage to your hits.

spell.name: Static Strike
spell.desc: Electrifies your attack and releases a static discharge.

spell.name: Dragon Talon
spell.desc: Triple kick your enemies with deadly accuracy.

spell.name: Emberstorm
spell.desc: Flaming bolts rain down and explode on impact.

spell.name: Dragon Flight
spell.desc: Perform a teleporting kick attack that deals damage to enemies near your target.

spell.name: Blades of Ice
spell.desc: Create a flurry of ice shards which seek out nearby enemies.

spell.name: Claw Mastery
spell.desc: Passive - Improves your skill with claw-class weapons.

spell.name: Psychic Hammer
spell.desc: Use the power of your mind to create a psychic blast to crush and knock back your enemies.

spell.name: Burst of Speed
spell.desc: Increases attack and movement speed for a period of time.

spell.name: Mind Barrier
spell.desc: Create a mental barrier around yourself that disarms enemies

spell.name: Weapon Block
spell.desc: Passive - Chance to block when you are using dual claw-class weapons.

spell.name: Cloak of Shadows
spell.desc: Cast a shadow to blind nearby enemies lowering their defenses for a period of time.

spell.name: Fade
spell.desc: Raise all resistances and resist curses for a period of time.

spell.name: Shadow Warrior
spell.desc: Summon a shadow of yourself that mimics your skills and fights by your side.

spell.name: Mind Blast
spell.desc: Using the power of your mind stun a group of enemies.

spell.name: Venom
spell.desc: Adds poison damage to your weapons. When active, Poison damage delivered by your weapon always lasts for 0.4 seconds

spell.name: Shadow Master
spell.desc: Summon a powerful shadow of yourself to fight by your side.

spell.name: Fire Blast
spell.desc: Throw a fire bomb to blast your enemies to bits.

spell.name: Shock Web
spell.desc: Throw a web of lightning to shock your enemies.

spell.name: Blade Throw
spell.desc: Set a spinning blade to patrol between you and target point.

spell.name: Charged Bolt Sentry
spell.desc: A trap that emits charged bolts at enemies that pass near.

spell.name: Wake of Fire
spell.desc: A trap that emits waves of fire.

spell.name: Blade Fury
spell.desc: Throw spinning blades to slice up your enemies.

spell.name: Lightning Sentry
spell.desc: A trap that shoots lightning to scorch passing enemies.

spell.name: Wake of Inferno
spell.desc: Trap that sprays fire at passing enemies.

spell.name: Death Sentry
spell.desc: Trap that shoots lightning at your enemies or explodes nearby corpses laying waste to more enemies.

spell.name: Blade Shield
spell.desc: Spinning blades slice enemies who stray too close.

spell.name: Summon Mastery
spell.desc: Passive - Increases the strength of your summons and revives.

spell.name: Raise Skeleton Warrior
spell.desc: Cast on the corpse of a slain monster, this raises a skeleton warrior that fights for you.

spell.name: Bone Offering
spell.desc: Consumes corpses to temporarily empower your party with toughness.

spell.name: Clay Golem
spell.desc: Creates a golem from the earth to fight by your side.

spell.name: Flesh Offering
spell.desc: Consumes corpses to temporarily empower your party with swiftness.

spell.name: Raise Skeletal Mage
spell.desc: Cast on the corpse of a slain monster, this raises a skeleton mage that fights for you.

spell.name: Blood Golem
spell.desc: Creates a golem that shares with you the life it steals.

spell.name: Convocation
spell.desc: Muster dark energies to warp you and your minions to a location.

spell.name: Iron Golem
spell.desc: Transform a metallic item into a golem that gains the properties of the item.

spell.name: Fire Golem
spell.desc: Creates a golem that converts the damage it receives from fire into life.

spell.name: Revive
spell.desc: Returns a monster to life to fight by your side.

spell.name: Deadly Poison
spell.desc: Coats your weapon in deadly poison and increases the potency of your poison skills. When active, poison damage delivered by your weapon always lasts for 2 seconds.

spell.name: Teeth
spell.desc: Fires a barrage of summoned barbed teeth.

spell.name: Bone Armor
spell.desc: Creates an orbiting shield of bone that absorbs melee damage.

spell.name: Corpse Explosion
spell.desc: Cast on the corpse of a slain monster, it explodes, damaging nearby enemies.

spell.name: Desecrate
spell.desc: Summons a pile of rotten corpses that release toxic fumes.

spell.name: Bone Spear
spell.desc: Summons a deadly spike of bone to impale your enemies.

spell.name: Bone Wall
spell.desc: Creates an impassable barrier of bone and debris.

spell.name: Bone Spirit
spell.desc: Releases a spirit of the restless undead that tracks its target or finds one of its own.

spell.name: Poison Nova
spell.desc: Emits an expanding ring of concentrated poison.

spell.name: Amplify Damage
spell.desc: Curses a group of enemies, increasing the non-magic damage they receive.

spell.name: Dim Vision
spell.desc: Curses a group of monsters, reducing their vision radius.

spell.name: Hemorrhage
spell.desc: Curses a group of enemies to cause bleeding which drains their life away (ignores curse overrides/immunities)

spell.name: Weaken
spell.desc: Curses a group of enemies, reducing the amount of damage they inflict.

spell.name: Iron Maiden
spell.desc: Curses a group of enemies, causing them to damage themselves when damaging others.

spell.name: Terror
spell.desc: Curses a group of monsters, causing them to flee in terror.

spell.name: Confuse
spell.desc: Curses a monster to force it to attack random targets.

spell.name: Life Tap
spell.desc: Curses a group of monsters so that damaging them gives the attacker life.

spell.name: Attract
spell.desc: Curses a monster to become the target of all nearby monsters. This curse may not be overridden by another curse.

spell.name: Decrepify
spell.desc: Curses a group of enemies to make them slow, weak and take amplified damage.

spell.name: Lower Resist
spell.desc: Curses an enemy to take more damage from all magical attacks. Lowers resistances of monsters. Lowers maximum resistances of hostile players.

spell.name: Howl
spell.desc: Sends nearby monsters scrambling away in fear.

spell.name: Find Potion
spell.desc: Use on the corpse of a slain monster for a chance to find a potion.

spell.name: Taunt
spell.desc: Enrages a monster into relentlessly attacking.

spell.name: Shout
spell.desc: Warns of impending danger and improves the defense rating of you and your party.

spell.name: Find Item
spell.desc: Use on the corpse of a slain monster to find hidden treasures.

spell.name: Battle Cry
spell.desc: Fearsome cry that decreases enemies' defense rating and damage.

spell.name: Battle Orders
spell.desc: Improves the maximum mana, life and stamina of you and your party.

spell.name: Grim Ward
spell.desc: Turn a corpse into a horrifying totem, decreasing the physical resistance of nearby enemies.

spell.name: War Cry
spell.desc: Injures and stuns all nearby enemies.

spell.name: Battle Command
spell.desc: Increases all current skill levels for you and your party.

spell.name: Edged Weapon Mastery
spell.desc: Passive - Improves fighting ability with swords, axes and daggers.

spell.name: Pole Weapon Mastery
spell.desc: Passive - Improves fighting ability with polearms and spears.

spell.name: Blunt Weapon Mastery
spell.desc: Passive - Improves fighting ability with maces, clubs and staves.

spell.name: Throwing Weapon Mastery
spell.desc: Passive - Improves thrown weapon fighting skill

spell.name: Increased Stamina
spell.desc: Passive - Increases your stamina.

spell.name: Iron Skin
spell.desc: Passive - Improves defense rating.

spell.name: Increased Speed
spell.desc: Passive - Increases walk and run speed.

spell.name: Natural Resistance
spell.desc: Passive - Increases natural resistances to elemental and poison damage.

spell.name: Frenzy
spell.desc: Allows you to swing two weapons at once. Each successful attack increases your overall speed. Requires you to equip two weapons.

spell.name: Concentrate
spell.desc: Attack that is not interruptible and improves attack and defense rating.

spell.name: Cleave
spell.desc: Attacks in an arc, dealing damage to all enemies caught in the swing.

spell.name: Stun
spell.desc: Stuns your target for a short time and increases your attack rating.

spell.name: Leap
spell.desc: Leaps away from danger or into the fray.

spell.name: Power Throw
spell.desc: Gathers momentum to unleash a powerful throw that deals damage to the target and nearby enemies.

spell.name: Bash
spell.desc: Powerful blow that converts physical damage to magic and knocks back enemies.

spell.name: Leap Attack
spell.desc: Leaps to and attacks target enemy in one swift assault.

spell.name: Ethereal Throw
spell.desc: Throw your weapon with tremendous force, converting it into a burst of energy that explodes upon impact.

spell.name: Whirlwind
spell.desc: A whirling dance of death that cuts a path through the legions of your enemies.

spell.name: Ice Bolt
spell.desc: Creates a magical bolt of ice that damage and slows your enemies.

spell.name: Frigerate
spell.desc: Chills equipped weapon of targeted character or minion. Adds cold damage to weapons.

spell.name: Frost Nova
spell.desc: Creates an expanding ring of ice that damages and slows all nearby enemies.

spell.name: Ice Blast
spell.desc: Creates a magical sphere of ice that damages and freezes your enemy.

spell.name: Shiver Armor
spell.desc: Increases your defense rating. Freezes and damages enemies that hit you.

spell.name: Glacial Spike
spell.desc: Creates a magical ice comet that freezes or kills nearby enemies.

spell.name: Blizzard
spell.desc: Summons massive shards of ice to destroy your enemies.

spell.name: Freezing Pulse
spell.desc: A powerful pulse of freezing air that passes through enemies, slowing and damaging them.

spell.name: Chilling Armor
spell.desc: Increases defense and discharges an ice bolt in retaliation against ranged attackers.

spell.name: Frozen Orb
spell.desc: Creates a magical globe that sprays a torrent of ice bolts to lay waste to your enemies.

spell.name: Cold Mastery
spell.desc: Passive - Increases the damage of your cold attacks by piercing enemies' resistances to cold.

spell.name: Charged Bolt
spell.desc: Creates multiple, randomly directed bolts of electrical energy.

spell.name: Static Field
spell.desc: Creates an electrical field that reduces life of all nearby enemies.

spell.name: Telekinesis
spell.desc: Uses the power of your mind to pick up items, use objects, and knockback enemies.

spell.name: Nova
spell.desc: Creates an expanding ring of lightning to shock nearby enemies.

spell.name: Lightning Surge
spell.desc: Creates a powerful lightning bolt to lay waste to your enemies.

spell.name: Chain Lightning
spell.desc: Creates a bolt of lightning that arcs through several targets.

spell.name: Teleport
spell.desc: Instantly moves to a destination within your line of sight.

spell.name: Discharge
spell.desc: Unleashes a burst of electricity all around you.

spell.name: Energy Shield
spell.desc: Creates a magical shield that consumes mana instead of health when you take damage.

spell.name: Lightning Mastery
spell.desc: Passive - Increases the damage of your lightning attacks by piercing enemies' resistances to lightning.

spell.name: Thunder Storm
spell.desc: Summons a thunderstorm that periodically blasts a nearby enemy with a bolt of lightning.

spell.name: Fire Bolt
spell.desc: Creates a magical flaming missile.

spell.name: Warmth
spell.desc: Passive - Increases your chance to attack and the rate at which you recover mana.

spell.name: Blaze
spell.desc: Your footsteps create areas of burning ground that damages enemies and heals you.

spell.name: Immolate
spell.desc: Creates a fiery blast in front of you engulfing enemies with intense heat.

spell.name: Fire Ball
spell.desc: Creates an explosive sphere of fiery death to engulf your enemies.

spell.name: Fire Wall
spell.desc: Creates a wall of flame that blocks of burns your enemies.

spell.name: Enflame
spell.desc: Enchants equipped weapon with fire damage.

spell.name: Meteor
spell.desc: Summons a meteor from the heavens to crush and incinerate your enemies.

spell.name: Fire Mastery
spell.desc: Passive - Increases the damage of your fire attacks by piercing enemies' resistances to fire.

spell.name: Hydra
spell.desc: Summons a multi-headed beast of flame to reduce your enemies to ashes.

spell.name: Firestorm
spell.desc: Unleash fiery chaos to burn your enemies.

spell.name: Molten Boulder
spell.desc: Launch a boulder of flaming hot magma that knocks back your enemies.

spell.name: Flame Dash
spell.desc: Instantly teleport to a location and unleash an fiery explosion that incinerates all enemies in your path.

spell.name: Arctic Blast
spell.desc: Blast a continuous jet of ice to burn your enemies with frost.

spell.name: Fissure
spell.desc: Open volcanic vents below your enemies, burning them to a crisp.

spell.name: Cyclone Armor
spell.desc: Shield yourself from damage caused by fire, cold, and lightning.

spell.name: Twister
spell.desc: Release several small whirlwinds that cut a path through your enemies.

spell.name: Volcano
spell.desc: Summon forth a volcano to rain death and destruction over your enemies.

spell.name: Tornado
spell.desc: Create a funnel of wind and debris to blast your enemies.

spell.name: Armageddon
spell.desc: Create a meteor shower to rain fiery destruction on nearby enemies.

spell.name: Hurricane
spell.desc: Create a massive storm of wind and debris to pound your enemies to bits.

spell.name: Werewolf
spell.desc: Transform into a werewolf.

spell.name: Lycanthropy
spell.desc: Passive - Improves damage and life when in werewolf or werebear form.

spell.name: Werebear
spell.desc: Transform into a werebear.

spell.name: Feral Rage
spell.desc: When in werewolf form, go into a frenzied rage to steal increasing amounts of life from your enemies with successive hits.

spell.name: Maul
spell.desc: When in werebear form, maul your enemies for increasing extra damage with successive hits.

spell.name: Rabies
spell.desc: When in werewolf form, bite your enemies to inflict them with disease that spreads to other monsters.

spell.name: Fire Claws
spell.desc: When in werewolf or werebear form, maul your enemies with a fiery claw attack.

spell.name: Hunger
spell.desc: When in werewolf or werebear form, bite your enemies to gain life and mana.

spell.name: Shock Wave
spell.desc: When in werebear form, stomp to create a shock wave that crushes enemies.

spell.name: Fury
spell.desc: When in werewolf form, attack either multiple adjacent targets or one target multiple times.

spell.name: Raven
spell.desc: Summon ravens to peck out the eyes of your enemies.

spell.name: Poison Creeper
spell.desc: Summon a vine that spreads disease to all it contacts.

spell.name: Heart of Wolverine
spell.desc: Summon a spirit pet that adds to the damage and attack rating of you and your party.

spell.name: Summon Spirit Wolf
spell.desc: Summon a wolf to fight by your side.

spell.name: Carrion Vine
spell.desc: Summon a vine that eats corpses and replenishes your life.

spell.name: Oak Sage
spell.desc: Summon a spirit pet that increases life for you and your party.

spell.name: Summon Dire Wolf
spell.desc: Summon a wold that becomes enraged, eating corpses to increase its damage.

spell.name: Solar Creeper
spell.desc: Summon a vine that eats corpses and replenishes your mana.

spell.name: Spirit of Barbs
spell.desc: Summon a spirit pet that reflects damage taken by you and your party back at your enemies.

spell.name: Summon Grizzly
spell.desc: Summon a ferocious grizzly bear.

spell.name: Prayer
spell.desc: When active, aura slowly regenerates the life of you and your party.

spell.name: Resist Fire
spell.desc: When active, aura decreases fire damage done to you and your party.

spell.name: Defiance
spell.desc: When active, aura increases the defense rating of you and your party.

spell.name: Resist Cold
spell.desc: When active, aura decreases cold damage done to you and your party.

spell.name: Cleansing
spell.desc: When active, aura reduces the length of time you and your party will remain poisoned or cursed.

spell.name: Resist Lightning
spell.desc: When active, aura decreases lightning damage done to you and your party.

spell.name: Vigor
spell.desc: When active, aura increases stamina recovery rate, maximum stamina and movement speed for you and your party.

spell.name: Meditation
spell.desc: When active, aura increases mana recovery for you and your party.

spell.name: Redemption
spell.desc: When active, aura attempts to redeem the souls of slain enemies to give you life and mana.

spell.name: Salvation
spell.desc: When active, aura increases the elemental resistances and damage of you and your party.

spell.name: Might
spell.desc: When active, aura increases the damage done by you and your party.

spell.name: Holy Fire
spell.desc: When active, aura damages nearby enemies with heavenly flames.

spell.name: Precision
spell.desc: When active, increases your chance to attack, pierce and deal double damage.

spell.name: Blessed Aim
spell.desc: When active, aura increases the attack rating for you and your party.

spell.name: Concentration
spell.desc: When active, aura increases the damage and decreases the chance that the attack will be interrupted for you and your party.

spell.name: Holy Freeze
spell.desc: When active, aura freezes nearby monsters.

spell.name: Holy Shock
spell.desc: When active, aura causes pulses of electricity to damage nearby enemies. Adds lightning damage to your attack.

spell.name: Sanctuary
spell.desc: When active, aura deals magic damage to nearby enemies and increases your damage against undead.

spell.name: Fanaticism
spell.desc: When active, aura increases damage, attack speed and attack rating for you and your party.

spell.name: Conviction
spell.desc: When active, aura reduces defenses and resistances of nearby enemies.

spell.name: Sacrifice
spell.desc: Increased accuracy and damage at the cost of life.

spell.name: Smite
spell.desc: Temporarily stun your enemy by bashing it with your shield.

spell.name: Holy Bolt
spell.desc: A bolt of divine energy that damages enemies or heals allies.

spell.name: Zeal
spell.desc: Allows you to attack multiple adjacent enemies with a single attack.

spell.name: Charge
spell.desc: Charge into battle and attack an enemy.

spell.name: Vengeance
spell.desc: Convert your based physical weapon damage into additional Fire, lightning and cold damage to each successful attack.

spell.name: Blessed Hammer
spell.desc: Summons an ethereal hammer that spirals outwards damaging enemies it hits.

spell.name: Conversion
spell.desc: Converts monsters to fight against other foul demons and beasts.

spell.name: Holy Shield
spell.desc: Enhances your shield with divine power.

spell.name: Fist of the Heavens
spell.desc: Lightning strikes your target as holy bolts seek out nearby enemies.

spell.name: Dashing Strike
spell.desc: Instantly dash forward to the target enemy or ally stunning and damaging enemies nearby.
